5056.verse: Indeed, it is a noble Qur'an

5058.verse: None touch it except the purified.

5059.verse: [It is] a revelation from the Lord of the worlds.

5060.verse: Then is it to this statement that you are indifferent

5061.verse: And make [the thanks for] your provision that you deny [the Provider]?

5062.verse: Then why, when the soul at death reaches the throat

5063.verse: And you are at that time looking on -

5064.verse: And Our angels are nearer to him than you, but you do not see -

5065.verse: Then why do you not, if you are not to be recompensed,

5066.verse: Bring it back, if you should be truthful?

5067.verse: And if the deceased was of those brought near to Allah,

5068.verse: Then [for him is] rest and bounty and a garden of pleasure.

5069.verse: And if he was of the companions of the right,

5070.verse: Then [the angels will say], "Peace for you; [you are] from the companions of the right."

5071.verse: But if he was of the deniers [who were] astray,

5072.verse: Then [for him is] accommodation of scalding water

5074.verse: Indeed, this is the true certainty,

5075.verse: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.

5076.verse: Whatever is in the heavens and earth exalts Allah, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

5077.verse: His is the dominion of the heavens and earth. He gives life and causes death, and He is over all things competent.

5078.verse: He is the First and the Last, the Ascendant and the Intimate, and He is, of all things, Knowing.
